name: N-hydroxy-L-valine,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (N-hydroxylating)
definition: N-Hydroxy-L-valine + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> N,N-Dihydroxy-L-valine + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the second step of three-step reaction (see R08663, R10031+R10032+R10033)
